page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CARL
page.content: At 7-15 I woke up.Whilst I was eating my Shreddies I watched Popeye I got dressed.THe sun was shining so I went to school on my BMX 8-50 I got to school and played until 9-00 when we had Assembly after we had to write a story.Two of us read out our stories I did, maths and at break we played tiggy on lines,11-00 I finish my work. At lunch time we ate our sandwiches outside, and played a game called colours! 1-00 we finished our paper mache before break and afterwards Mr. Thorold came to tell us about Jesus. At 3-15 I went home on my BMX I watched a cartoon and then went to Spilsby to do some shopping. After tea our friends came. I played on the swing with Helena and Robert. 9-00 I went to bed and my Daddy read me a story.
